title: E-Commerce Tech Global Summit 2021 | Meetup
description: E-Commerce is continuously growing and can grow even more. Although online shopping has become one of the foremost popular online activities, the planet of eCommerce has become more competitive. To stay competitive, organizations have to monitor new 2021 eCommerce trends constantly.During this Global eCommerce Summit, participants, partners, and solution providers will be exposed to successful case studies, topics as per recent developments, panel discussions to understand the holistic views from industry practitioners, and fresh ideas to keep up with the challenges.ğŸ’¥ 24+ hours of tech talks from more than 30 experienced developers working in the TOP eCommerce companies, such as Alibaba, Etsy, Salesforce, and Shopware!ğŸ’¥ Multi-Stream conference across time zonesğŸ’¥ New trends will be discussed, like Headless eCommerce, PWA, and also how to deal with the challenges that developers face, such as: using big data, security issues, AI, VR, and scaling the infrastructure to handle large traffic.ğŸ«Free track and Senior Track are available!ğŸ«Register in 2 clicks: https://geekle.us/e-commerce
